comments: This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract. This is a notice of the restatement of Contract EN57932943 dated 2013-02-28/2013-03-31. The contract was misstated for original contract value, $520,534.50, and contract end date, 2013-10-25, which omitted the option, and has been corrected.
